thread.title: Tuscan man stumbles down sloped street with bike before falling over
thread.title_full: Tuscan man stumbles down sloped street with bike before falling over | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Tuscan man stumbles down sloped street with bike before falling over
text:
2
View
comments
Going abroad allows you to experience new cultures, climates and eccentric locals going about their daily routines.
And one opportunistic video maker captured exactly the latter while standing on a beautifully picturesque street in Tuscany.
In the clip, an apparently drunk man makes his way down a cobbled, slopping road – terrain that would be difficult to negotiate sober – with his bicycle.
Man takes spectacular tumble down hill in Tuscany The man, who appears to be drunk, makes his way down the picturesque sloped and cobbled street in Tuscany
As he struggles down the hill he uses the brake on his bike to slow his progress and walks alongside it with his feet slapping down onto the pavement with every step.
The locals watching the man – who have perhaps witnessed him negotiating the same road before – make noise in anticipation of him falling.
 What WAS she thinking? Zoo visitor lucky to escape with life... Magaluf holidaymaker passes out over and over again while... Terrifying moment a lion attempts to attack a car driver... Hawk enforces no-fly zone: Territorial bird of prey... But for the most part the man does quite well.
Despite stumbling down the road, he manages to hold himself up and uses the bike as a form of stabiliser to steady his speed.
The crowd make noise as the man begins losing control of his bike and momentum causes him to stumble
Momentum eventually begins to take over however, and the bike starts to ride away from him as he struggles to control the pace.
The crowd notices as the man begins to lose his balance and the noises become louder.
The bike then turns sideways and all is lost for the man – he falls onto the floor to the sound of cheering from the group of onlookers.
The bike turns sideways and the man loses his footing, which causes him to fall over his bike and onto the floor
Rolling about, the man attempts to get his balance and scrambles to his feet while holding onto the wall for support.
He then goes down to pick his bike up from the ground but ends up falling head over heels again and landing on top of it.
The video concludes with the man getting to his feet and falling over one more time before a bystander picks up his bike and gives him a much needed hand.
The video concludes with the man getting to his feet and using the wall for support as a bystander helps him
